archimate:Capability.name: Team Development
archimate:Capability.documentation:
The ability to support the professional development of both the team and individuals. Key to this is the creation of team and individual development tools such as training and reference material and the creation of an environment that supports self directed learning and development. This also includes the ability to manage and support team members on a individual basis, including having regular meetings, creating personal develop plans, reviewing performance, mentoring and coaching and so on.
Outcomes:
Higher team engagement A team equipped with the right skills and access to information need to develop skills further
